chunks.title: My Last Video  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #139.mp4

chunks.title: My Last Video  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #139.mp4

chunks.title: My Last Video  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #139.mp4

chunks.title: My Last Video  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #139.mp4
chunks.text: And brought some impact

chunks.title: My Last Video  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #139.mp4
chunks.text: In the web development industry

chunks.title: My Last Video  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #139.mp4
chunks.text: That's all for this course

chunks.title: My Last Video  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #139.mp4
chunks.text: Thank you so much guys

chunks.title: My Last Video  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #139.mp4
chunks.text: For watching this video

chunks.title: My Last Video  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #139.mp4
chunks.text: And watching this course

chunks.title: My Last Video  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #139.mp4
chunks.text: And I will see you

chunks.title: My Last Video  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #139.mp4
chunks.text: Next time

text: We will start the sigma web development course Why, how, what happened You have given so much love to this course You have come back to the sigma web development course Sigma web development course Sigma batch OP Guys, I am very emotional today I don't know if I should be emotional or not First of all, I want to thank you from the bottom of my heart That you gave so much love to this course Many people reported that their jobs were taken Many people took up freelancing projects They learned a lot in life because of this course So I feel good when I hear all these things I never thought that I would be able to make such a big comprehensive resource in my life To learn web development But today I am recording this video with great pride And I feel very good from the heart Emotions are full I thought and I did it I have worked very hard to make this course Have made a lot of sacrifices If you remember, I initially launched this course as a paid course But later many people said that web development is a basic thing And it would be great if you make it available for free And then finally I changed my decision Made it available as a free course And I feel very good that so many people are able to see it And will learn in the coming time too For years to come, it has become a very good resource to learn web development In any course on the internet, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, MongoDB I have never made it with Next.js in full detail No one has made it And if I talk about YouTube, there was a big gap on YouTube Which I filled through this course I feel good from the heart I had to take a lot of trouble in freeing this course With people in the industry Many people said that why are you freeing this course Because many people sell web development courses Which is not bad There is nothing wrong in it But I was contacted by many people That don't do this Because if I will create a free resource Then paid courses will stop selling But again I made my decision I am not against any paid course seller In fact, if someone is selling paid courses by hard work Then there is nothing wrong in it Every person has the right to get the result of his hard work And there is nothing wrong in it I kept this course free because When I look back at my condition And when I was learning web development If I would have got such a resource then it would have been great So I thought that if children can learn web development for free Then overall web development community Overall coding community will get a very good boost And if I contribute in this Then there can be nothing better for me I feel very good from the heart Now I have to see many more things in life But despite that, I took out late nights and gave this course And the result was very good And I am very happy that I was able to complete this course After watching this course, people have jobs Which is a very good thing And you can also get a job If you have not completed this course yet And somehow you are watching this video Then do complete this course I have put a lot of effort to make this course And those who have completed this course This was a very important part of your journey But in the coming time, you have to make many projects Make your personal projects And move forward in the same way With that said, now I will tell you How you can move forward in your journey We saw the front end in this course We saw the backend in this course We saw the database, we saw next.js We did a lot of things and saw how a real world project can be made Many people were talking about TypeScript So yes, you can use TypeScript for complex projects I will definitely make a separate video for you about TypeScript But I also want to tell you that You can make very good projects without TypeScript The projects in the industry that companies work hard to maintain for years TypeScript is used to reduce that hard work Because TypeScript catches bugs ahead of time TypeScript is a very good technology I will definitely discuss this But even without TypeScript, you can make very good projects Now I would like to talk about Git and GitHub Many people do not know Git and GitHub Which is a problem Because if you do not know Git and GitHub Then maybe you will not be able to code share in the industry Now it is very easy to learn Git and GitHub So you have to learn Git and GitHub with time And along with that, make your GitHub profile The biggest benefit of making a GitHub profile is Whenever someone wants to contact you And wants to see your work Then he can be impressed by seeing your fancy GitHub profile And you have to make your GitHub profile fancy Many people say that you should not get into fancy work Work is good But no, you have to sell your work too So if you want to keep yourself in the market Then you will have to make your profile fancy Now push your projects on GitHub So that you can see those projects And use it as a directory Suppose you used NextAuth in a project And now you have to use NextAuth in your new project So you can see the code of your old project You can refer it So it became your directory Along with that, I will recommend you Make a personal portfolio website and a blog Means make a personal portfolio website and blog on the same website So that it is easy for people to contact you Plus, if you are able to write what you are learning in the blog form Then it will become an online directory for you Along with that, when you explain something Then you understand it better One more suggestion I want to give you Is to make a very good LinkedIn profile And reach out to people daily So that you can explore new opportunities Now before doing this It is very important for you to know something I have seen that many people leave before finding a job And they know nothing So first of all you have to complete this course And after that you make some good projects And after that you reach out to people Show them what you have done Now it may take you 6 months to 1 year After listening 6 months to 1 year, many people will run away That this is a very big time But in 6 months to 1 year, you can become a very dangerous web developer This is my claim from you if you have given the time well You can become in 3 months But if I say a complete web developer Who handles things very well I keep a time window of 6 months to 1 year After this, there are many web development related Or tech related events I will say that you go to those events And many events in Bangalore, Chennai You get to attend for free Many people miss this And think that this is a waste of time But I am telling you that this is not a waste of time If you make a balance and attend the events Then you will get the opportunity to meet new people You will meet people in the industry Who have the same thoughts as you And new opportunities will open for you If you think that yes, I have reached a level I have made a lot of good projects I have done a lot of good work in the industry Related to web development Then you can reach out to people through emails And I can give you a 95% guarantee That you will land a very amazing job Getting a job is not a big thing If you know about web development All the recruiters I meet tell me That there are a lot of people in the industry But very few good people So if you become a good person Then you can definitely get a job After this, one more thing Meanwhile, until you are not getting a job You can build your own SaaS Software as a service Again, you don't have to invest a lot of money You can start it as a hobby project Pick a problem and try to solve it Maybe make an invoice app Maybe make an app In which you can manage your data Make an app in which There are a lot of web development related templates Make anything And you will get ideas Use chart gpt to explore ideas Now don't overuse chart gpt I have seen that people overuse chart gpt They think they can do everything with chart gpt You have to solve small problems with chart gpt For example If you have to write a function Which is of 4 numbers Maybe I will write it It will take time Don't make a big problem with chart gpt Make a video calling app You can't make chart gpt Solve all the problems with chart gpt And you will control the overall problem And one more thing Luck, hard work, time, sleep, seriousness All these things matter You don't have to blame anyone You have to take all the blame And you have to be responsible And you will definitely move ahead I hope that I made this course And brought some impact In the web development industry That's all for this course Thank you so much guys For watching this video And watching this course And I will see you Next time
